caregiving.name: Assisting Elderly to Stand
caregiving.purpose: Safely transition from a sitting to standing posture.

content.content: 1) Inform the elderly patient to put his/her hands on his/her knees.
2) Ask the patient to wriggle towards the front of the chair.
3) Assist patient to tuck their feet backwards and bring legs hip width apart.
4) Place one hand on the patient's shoulder on the side near you, and the other hand around the patient's hips, on the side away from you.
5) On the count of 3, lift the patient upwards as he/she attempt to stand up.
